kchandra423.kImages

Interface KImage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KCollider

    public interface KImage
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents an image that can be moved around and resized. Supports Gif, jpeg, and png images. Gifs will be properly animated. Uses processing to draw.
    See Also:
    PImage
